description:
Approach

Park exit vehicle at Devils Kitchen parking area. Drive and park entrance vehicle at trailhead off of Little Park road at top of middle canyon finger.

Descent

Three major waterfalls. All but second waterfall can be downclimbed or bypassed around. Second waterfall requires a major bypass out of canyon right or west. To stay in canyon, requires a 50ft rappel.

Exit

Red tape

Colorado National Monument pass is required to park at Devils Kitchen area.

Beta sites

  • SummitPost.org  : No Thoroughfare Canyon

Trip reports and media

Background
name: No Thoroughfare Canyon
